org.eclipse.keyple.distributed

Interface ObservableRemotePluginClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservablePlugin, org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Plugin, RemotePluginClient

    public interface ObservableRemotePluginClient
extends RemotePluginClient, org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservablePlugin
    API of the Observable Remote Plugin Client associated to the Local Service Server.

    This plugin must be used when you intend to observe remotely the plugin events.

    It must be registered by the application installed on a Client not having local access to the smart card reader and that wishes to control the reader remotely :

    • To register the plugin, use the method SmartCardService.registerPlugin(PluginFactory) using the factory {link RemotePluginClientFactory} and activate the plugin observation.
    • To access the plugin, use the utility method {link RemotePluginClientUtils#getObservableRemotePlugin()}.
    • To unregister the plugin, use the method SmartCardService.unregisterPlugin(String) using the plugin name.

    This plugin behaves like an ObservablePlugin.

    Since:
    1.0
